divs: sighting detailsi was driving around shortly after moving to euegene oregon many years ago (1998). i was on an empty road. the sun was starting to go down. i was rocking out to the radio, listening to that cherry poppin daddys song, zuit suit riot. it had just ended and the dj came on to say it was 4;50 or so, talking about the commute\yraffic. i pulled my hair up and drove with my knee for a sec, was growing out bangs or i wouldn't remember because i hated the length when i tried to get them back. then my car slowed down. i'd had starter problems for a while and i was so young i'm not sure what i was thinking but i wasn't alarmed. i remember thining of my low cell battery and being happy it still had juice. then i was going to turn on my lighs and there was like, a truck coming with its lights on and it was sort of bright, which i think distracted me from getting out my phone. the next thing i knew it was dark and and i was on the side of the road with my radio on fuzz, lights on in the car and i felt startled. when i opened my cell, which was laying beside my purse, it was 5;20. my car was just pulled over, not parked. i don't remember pulling off the road at all, just that my car quit running and and there was a truck comming, or something big. my car took a few seconds to turn over, it seemed week which was normal even after replacing the battery two weeks earlier. this is really old and i'm really sort of ashamed to be writing this as though it were some sort of ufo thing. i could never say for sure what happened that fall but i know it wasn't right somehow. because i know all these years later that i cannot explain where i was. i must have been somewhere because my hair was down and over to the right side. my hair band was no where i could find in the car and i'd just put it up. my (short) heels were not on my feet but on the floorboards and i crossed my feet to get into them again. all my radio stations were blank as was my clock, as though my battery failed. i was pretty stressed out with my first real job... and i had starter problems but that should not have had any effect on my running car. as i left i noticed that my wipers were on too. i can't imagine what happended even ten yeasr later. like how my shoes were crossed, my hair was down, my radio was messed up and my windsheild wipers were on. i was really happy to get rid of that car. anyway, i don't know.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around October 31st 1998
Summary: i was driving, then i wasn't.
